Job Title: Renewable  : Developing and Implementing a Comprehensive Compensation Structure
Description:
Green Tech United, a leading provider in the renewable energy market, is seeking a highly skilled and experienced HR & Sales Market Manager to help drive the growth of our company. As a contract-to-hire position, the successful candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing a comprehensive compensation structure, employee handbook, and sales structure that supports our mission to democratize transparency in the U.S. solar and renewable energy markets.

Responsibilities:

Design and implement a compensation structure that aligns with industry standards in the renewable energy market
Develop and maintain an updated employee handbook that reflects the company's culture and values
Create and manage a sales structure that maximizes the 1099 nature of our organization
Oversee the management of HR processes and procedures, including employee relations and benefits administration
Provide support and guidance to the sales team to help drive growth and achieve company objectives
Requirements:

5+ years of experience in HR and sales management, with a focus on the renewable energy market
Knowledge of industry-specific compensation structures, employee relations, and benefits administration
Proven ability to design and implement sales structures that drive growth and achieve company objectives
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment
This is a contract-to-hire position with competitive hourly compensation. If you are a seasoned HR & Sales Market Manager with a passion for the renewable energy industry, we encourage you to apply. Please include a cover letter and resume to showcase your experience and qualifications.

About Green Tech United:
Green Tech United is a provider of solar energy solutions and a leader in the renewable energy market. With a focus on democratizing transparency in the U.S. solar and renewable energy markets, we are dedicated to helping drive the growth of the industry and creating a better future for our children and the planet. Join our team and make a difference today!

Job Title: Business Plan for Event Rental Biz
Description: I am purchasing an existing floral design/event rental business and would like someone to help me bring my vision for it to life. The business plan I would like to have as an e-file must be suitable for investors.

Job Title: Looking To Hire Social Media Manager
Description:
Social Media Manager  

Are you in Florida? Are you in your element when you’re helping others realize their potential? Can you have an entire conversation in emojis?

  If you answered “YES!” to the questions above, we’d love to have you join our team. 

Yellow Umbrella is looking for a Social Media Manager to help us reach the next generation with positivity, empowerment, and knowledge of modeling. This is an in office position.

Responsibilities 
The Social Media Manager is responsible for:
 • Design and schedule content across all social media platforms.
 • Develop a focused marketing strategy to increase traffic and visibility of accounts.
 • Develop and manage the weekly content schedule for Victory social media platforms. 
• Create incredibly engaging written and visual content. 
• Collaborate with other content creators to support engagement campaigns. 
• Identify and measure key performance metrics to determine success of efforts.
 • Develop and monitor paid advertising campaigns that lead to the conversion of casual social media users to engaged followers and ultimately visitors. 
• Build and coach a social media content creation team. (Only for those looking for a long term position)
• Recruit others with marketing, content creation, and/or public speaking abilities and coordinate with them to serve the social media needs of Yellow Umbrella (only for those looking for a long term position)

Reports To: 
Communications Project Manager  

Skills and Qualifications 
•Can be Entry level, but some experience is a benefit
• Continuously learn new social media trends, tools, and platforms, providing insight to execute new strategies to grow engagement. 
• Strong written, verbal and interpersonal communication skills to create relationships. 
• Strong writing, editing and proofing skills. 
• Ability to problem solve, make independent decisions and be self-motivated. 
• Experience managing social media campaigns. 
• Experience building teams and developing leaders. (Long term position seekers)
• Graphic design and Adobe Photoshop/Illustrator experience (not required but a benefit)

 Hours: 
This position is full-time or part time. Some weekend and evening hours, are required.  

Benefits: 
• Learn what it takes for modeling agencies to succeed and build relationships
• Work with a company that stands for the rights of women, and helps regular every day people do what they always dreamed of
• Have a team of people behind you instead of having to do everything yourself (videographers, writers, project managers, etc.)
• Flexible and remote scheduling available
 • Relaxed, friendly atmosphere 
• Opportunities for professional development

Job Title: Spicy short form content + strategy for an unsexy fintech company
Description:
Looking for someone that can help build short-form content while helping to shape the strategy. 

We sell software to manage M&A: dealroom.net
and educational products: mascience.com

It's a pretty dry/boring industry. We have tons of top-funnel content but very little middle and bottom-funnel content.

Someone that can take pretty complex concepts or product demo and develop into short-form content that's simple and appeals to a wider audience would be a good fit for this.

Please a little bit about your related experience in a few sentences and maybe share an example.

Thanks!

I recently joined a major publication council membership for outbound marketing. I would like to hire a ghostwriter for article submissions in the following areas

- facebook advertising: how to and best practices
- MMMs and why they are necessary for your company
- trends in the paid social
- upcoming trends in influencer
- generative AI technology and its impact on technology

For background, I have deep expertise in paid social marketing, measurement, attribution, and creative trends in the space. 

My target with this contract would be to generate 3 articles in total to submit and form a working relationship with a writer for future sprint processes.

If interested in previous articles written, about 95% of the blog posts here - https://www.dysrupt.com/thought-leadership - were generated from me.

Please only contact me on Upwork. Contacting outside of upwork will result in immediate disqualification.

Job Title: Looking for Top Talent FB/IG/Tik Tok Ads

Job Title: Need a good digital marketing person/company to help us with our SaaS
Description:
READ THE ENTIRE JOB POSTING. If you simply write back that you are a Facebook Ads manager... do not apply.

We need someone with vast knowledge of digital marketing for AccountSend.com 

We need someone to help us get the company out there to start generating serious revenue.

We have a small budget for testing... the testing phase must yield tangible results to increase the budget. We do not have $10,000 to spend on Facebook ads to test... I've no interest in that. We've spent $25,000 on Facebook ads and barely broke even The cost per acquisition on Facebook has become outlandishly ridiculously high. So, if you are going to propose Facebook ads.... please do not apply.  We've had 10 other firms try to manage our Facebook Ads account and they all failed. I've heard EVERY strategy in the world... NOTHING works.

We need a strategy that will work, is cheap to test, and can yield results. We have all the data we can use such as email and mobile phones. Again, do not simply write back "we can run an email campaign via mailchimp".... we can do that ourselves... and mailchimp will shut it down immediately

We need a comprehensive cover letter explaining what you actually can do for us with DETAIL.

Please respond with "Yes, I've read the gig". You will not get an interview without writing this.
